input.label: Search Head
input.populatingSearch: | tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby SearchHead

input.label: Select Leader (Based on Org Chart)
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup LDAPMgmtChain | makemv delim="|" ManagementChain_sAMAccountName | stats values(sAMAccountName) as user by ManagementChain_sAMAccountName | eval tstats_search_criteria="(user=" . mvjoin(user," OR user=") . ")" | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as ManagementChain_sAMAccountName OUTPUTNEW name | eval MyName=name . " (" . ManagementChain_sAMAccountName . ")" | sort MyName

search.query: |inputlookup TaggedUsers | stats values(user) as user by category | eval search="(user=" . mvjoin(user, " OR user=") . ")" | stats values(category) as category by search | eval category=mvjoin(category," / ")

table.title: Overall Metrics
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby searchtype, user | stats sum(count) as count sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as "Adhoc Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="dashboard",count,0))) as "Dashboard Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="realtime",count,0))) as "Realtime Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="scheduled",count,0))) as "Scheduled Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="summarization",count,0))) as "Summarization Search Count" by user | stats sum(count) as "Total Number of Searches" count as "Number of Users" count(eval(count>30)) as "Number of Users with > 30 searches" sum("* Search Count") as "* Search Count" | eval Type = "Total" | append [| tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby searchtype, user _time span=1d | stats sum(count) as count sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as "Adhoc Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="dashboard",count,0))) as "Dashboard Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="realtime",count,0))) as "Realtime Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="scheduled",count,0))) as "Scheduled Search Count" sum(eval(if(searchtype="summarization",count,0))) as "Summarization Search Count" by user, _time | stats sum(count) as "Total Number of Searches" count as "Number of Users" count(eval(count>30)) as "Number of Users with > 30 searches" sum("* Search Count") as "* Search Count" by _time | stats avg(*) as * | eval Type = "Daily Average"] | foreach *Number* *Count* [fieldformat "<<FIELD>>"=round('<<FIELD>>',1)] | fields Type *Number* *Count*

search.query: |stats count as bogus | append [| tstats local=t count sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time sum(NumExports) as NumExports from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time user searchtype span=1d | stats sum(count) as NumSearches sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",count,0))) as NumAdHocSearches sparkline(sum(count)) as UsageTrend sum(total_run_time) as HoursOfSearchTime sum(eval(if(searchtype="adhoc",total_run_time,0))) as HoursOfAdHocSearchTime sum(NumExports) as NumberOfExports by user| where user!="splunk-system-user" | eval HoursOfSearchTime = round(HoursOfSearchTime/3600,2) | eval HoursOfAdHocSearchTime = round(HoursOfAdHocSearchTime/3600,2) | sort - count ] | append [| tstats prestats=t local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby searchcommands , user| stats count by searchcommands, user| eval maturity=`eval_high_complexity_search_commands` | eval maturity=`eval_med_complexity_search_commands` | eval maturity=`eval_low_complexity_search_commands` | stats sum(eval(if(searchcommands="search",count,null))) as search_num sum(maturity) as maturity by user | eval "search_complexity_score"=if(maturity/search_num>`max_search_complexity_rating`,`max_search_complexity_rating`,1+round(maturity/search_num,0)) | fields user search_complexity_score | sort - search_complexity_score | streamstats count as complexity_order | eventstats count as NumComplexityUsers] | append [| tstats local=t avg(accuracy) as Accuracy from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ accuracy>0 total_run_time>0 result_count>0 searchtype=adhoc groupby user| sort - Accuracy | streamstats count as accuracy_order | eventstats count as NumAccuracyUsers] | append [ | tstats local=t avg(total_run_time) as runtime from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby user | eval runtime=round(runtime,0) | stats avg(runtime) as runtime by user | fields user runtime | sort - runtime | streamstats count as runtime_order | eventstats count as NumRuntimeUsers] | append [| tstats local=t count sum(ShouldInvestigate) as ShouldInvestigate from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby user | sort - ShouldInvestigate | streamstats count as investigate_order | eventstats count as NumInvestigateUsers] | append [| tstats local=t count from `SA_Events` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ type=scheduler groupby user status | append [| tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby user search_status ] | stats sum(eval(if(status="skipped",count,0))) as SkippedScheduled sum(eval(if(status="success",count,0))) as SuccessfulScheduled sum(eval(if(search_status="failed",count,0))) as FailedAdHoc sum(eval(if(search_status="success",count,0))) as SuccessfulAdHoc by user | eval PercentFailed=round(100*(SkippedScheduled+FailedAdHoc)/(SuccessfulScheduled+SuccessfulAdHoc)) | sort - PercentFailed | streamstats count as FailureOrder | eventstats max(FailureOrder) as NumUsersFailure ] | eval "Accuracy Order" = accuracy_order . " out of " . NumAccuracyUsers | eval "Search Complexity Order" = complexity_order . " out of " . NumComplexityUsers | eval "Slow Search Runtime Order" = runtime_order . " out of " . NumRuntimeUsers | eval "Search Failure Order" = FailureOrder . " out of " . NumUsersFailure | eval "Questionable Search Order" = investigate_order . " out of " . NumInvestigateUsers | lookup LDAPSearch sAMAccountName as user OUTPUTNEW mail | eventstats values(*Order*) as *Order* by user | fields user NumSearches NumAdHocSearches UsageTrend HoursOfSearchTime HoursOfAdHocSearchTime NumberOfExports "Accuracy Order" "Search Complexity Order" "Search Failure Order" "Questionable Search Order" "Slow Search Runtime Order" mail | sort - NumSearches | where NumSearches>0

chart.title: Top Users
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time `UserOrName` span=1d | timechart count by `UserOrName` useother=f limit=20 | fields - splunk-system-user

chart.title: Count by Search Type
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time searchtype span=1d | timechart count by searchtype

search.query: | tstats prestats=t local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` groupby searchtype, SearchHead | chart count over SearchHead by searchtype

| tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_Events` where * $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ type=weblog groupby myapp myview | stats count by myapp, myview | sort myapp, -count | streamstats count as mycount by myapp | where mycount <=5 | stats sum(count) as "Total Hits" list(count) as "Hits Per View" list(myview) as "Views" by myapp | rename myapp to "App" | sort - "Total Hits"

chart.title: Search Health and Activity Indicators
chart.searchString: | tstats prestats=t local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby searchcommands _time span=1d |bucket _time span=1d| stats count by searchcommands, _time| eval maturity=`eval_high_complexity_search_commands` | eval maturity=`eval_med_complexity_search_commands` | eval maturity=`eval_low_complexity_search_commands` | stats sum(eval(if(searchcommands="search",count,null))) as search_num sum(maturity) as maturity by _time | eval "search_complexity_score"=if(maturity/search_num>`max_search_complexity_rating`,`max_search_complexity_rating`,1+round(maturity/search_num,1)) | fields _time search_complexity_score | join type=outer _time [| tstats prestats=t local=t sum(event_count) sum(scan_count) from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ total_run_time>15 event_count>0 searchtype=adhoc groupby _time span=1d | bucket _time span=1d | stats sum(event_count) as events sum(scan_count) as scanned by _time | eval coverage = 100 * events/scanned | timechart span=1d avg(coverage) as Accuracy] | join type=outer _time [| tstats local=t prestats=t avg(total_run_time) as runtime from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d avg(total_run_time) as total_run_time ] | join type=outer _time [| tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count as NumAdHocQueries ] | join type=outer _time [| tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time span=1d | timechart span=1d count as NumTotalQueries ] | join type=outer _time [| tstats local=t count from `SA_Events` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ type=scheduler groupby _time span=1d status | append [| tstats local=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time span=1d search_status ] | bucket _time span=1d | stats sum(eval(if(status="skipped",count,0))) as SkippedScheduled sum(eval(if(status="success",count,0))) as SuccessfulScheduled sum(eval(if(search_status="failed",count,0))) as FailedAdHoc sum(eval(if(search_status="completed",count,0))) as SuccessfulAdHoc by _time | eval PercentFailed=round(100*(SkippedScheduled+FailedAdHoc)/(SuccessfulScheduled+SuccessfulAdHoc)) | timechart span=1d avg(PercentFailed) as PercentageSearchesFailing] | eventstats avg(*) as avg* | eval search_complexity_score=round(100*search_complexity_score/avgsearch_complexity_score,1) | eval Accuracy=round(100*Accuracy/avgAccuracy,1) | eval NumAdHocQueries=round(100*NumAdHocQueries/avgNumAdHocQueries,1) | eval NumTotalQueries=round(100*NumTotalQueries/avgNumTotalQueries,1) | eval PercentageSearchesFailing = round(100* PercentageSearchesFailing / avgPercentageSearchesFailing,1) | eval total_run_time=round(100*total_run_time/avgtotal_run_time,1) | rename search_complexity_score as "Search Complexity vs Avg (%)" Accuracy as "Search Accuracy vs Avg (%)" NumAdHocQueries as "# of Adhoc Queries vs Avg (%)" NumTotalQueries as "Total # of Queries vs Avg (%)" PercentageSearchesFailing as "Percentage of Searches Failing (%)" | fields _time "* *" | timechart bins=50 values(*) as *

html.p: The below cover security risks and configurations.

search.query: | tstats local=t count as "Number of Exports" values(actualsearch) as Search dc(user) as NumUsers max(result_count) as "Number of Results" values(user) as "Users who Exported" from `SA_SearchHistory` where * (SearchHead=*) * * WasExported=yes groupby searchid | sort - "Number of Results", NumUsers | table searchid "Number of Results" "Users Who Exported" "Number of Exports" Search

chart.title: Number of Shared Searches over Time
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t prestats=t count from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ WasShared=Yes groupby _time span=1d | timechart bins=50 count

table.title: Search Performance by User
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time sum(result_count) as result_count sum(scan_count) as scan_count avg(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby user _time | stats sum(count) as count sparkline(sum(count)) as "Search Trend" sum(total_run_time) as "Sum of Search Runtime (Hours)" avg(eval(result_count/count)) as "Average Number of Results Returned Per Search" avg(eval(scan_count/count)) as "Average Number of Events Scanned Per Search" avg(searchspan_m) as "Average Timespan (min)" by user | eval "Total Search Runtime (Hours)"='Total Search Runtime (Hours)'/3600 | foreach "Average Number of Results Returned Per Search" "Average Number of Events Scanned Per Search" "Total Search Runtime (Hours)" "Average Timespan (min)" "Sum of Search Runtime (Hours)" [eval "<<FIELD>>"=round('<<FIELD>>')]| eval "Sum of Search Runtime (Hours)" = round('Sum of Search Runtime (Hours)'/3600,1) | sort - count | where user!="splunk-system-user"

table.title: Search Commands Associated with Expensive Searches
table.searchString: | tstats local=t count as "Number of Searches" avg(total_run_time) stdev(total_run_time) from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ searchtype=adhoc groupby searchcommands | sort - avg(total_run_time)

table.title: Average Search Timespan by User
table.searchString: | tstats local=t sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time avg(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m avg(searchspan_h) as searchspan_h avg(searchspan_d) as searchspan_d from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby user | eval total_run_time=round(total_run_time/3600,2) | where user!="n/a" | rename searchspan_m as "Search Timespan (min)" searchspan_d as "Search Timespan (day)" searchspan_h as "Search Timespan (hour)" total_run_time as "Total Search Runtime (h)" | sort - "Total Search Runtime (h)" | where user!="splunk-system-user"

chart.title: Change in User Search Settings
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time avg(accuracy) as accuracy sum(result_count) as result_count sum(scan_count) as scan_count sum(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time | eval ResultsPerSecond=result_count / total_run_time | eval ScannedPerSecond=scan_count / total_run_time| timechart span=1d avg(accuracy) as accuracy avg(*PerSecond) as *PerSecond avg(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m avg(result_count) as result_count | eventstats avg(accuracy) as avgaccuracy avg(ResultsPerSecond) as avgResultsPerSecond avg(ScannedPerSecond) as avgScannedPerSecond avg(searchspan_m) as avgsearchspan_m avg(result_count) as avgresult_count | eval accuracy=round(100*(accuracy/avgaccuracy)) | eval ResultsPerSecond=round(100*(ResultsPerSecond/avgResultsPerSecond)) | eval ScannedPerSecond=round(100*(ScannedPerSecond/avgScannedPerSecond)) | eval searchspan_m=round(100*(searchspan_m/avgsearchspan_m)) | eval result_count=round(100*(result_count/avgresult_count)) | fields - avg* | rename accuracy AS "Accuracy (% Delta)" ResultsPerSecond as "Results/Second (% Delta)" ScannedPerSecond as "Scanned/Second (% Delta)" searchspan_m as "Timespan (% Delta)" result_count as "# Results (% Delta)" | fields _time "*Results *" "Accuracy*" "Timespan*" | timechart bins=50 avg(*) as *

chart.title: Change in System Search Performance Metrics
chart.searchString: | tstats local=t sum(total_run_time) as total_run_time avg(accuracy) as accuracy sum(result_count) as result_count sum(event_count) as event_count sum(scan_count) as scan_count sum(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m from `SA_SearchHistory` where * $sh_clause$ $tagged_user_criteria$ $user_criteria$ groupby _time | eval EventsPerSecond=event_count / total_run_time | eval ScannedPerSecond=scan_count / total_run_time| timechart span=1d avg(accuracy) as accuracy avg(*PerSecond) as *PerSecond avg(searchspan_m) as searchspan_m avg(result_count) as result_count | eventstats avg(accuracy) as avgaccuracy avg(EventsPerSecond) as avgEventsPerSecond avg(ScannedPerSecond) as avgScannedPerSecond avg(searchspan_m) as avgsearchspan_m avg(result_count) as avgresult_count | eval accuracy=round(100*(accuracy/avgaccuracy)) | eval EventsPerSecond=round(100*(EventsPerSecond/avgEventsPerSecond)) | eval ScannedPerSecond=round(100*(ScannedPerSecond/avgScannedPerSecond)) | eval searchspan_m=round(100*(searchspan_m/avgsearchspan_m)) | eval result_count=round(100*(result_count/avgresult_count)) | fields - avg* | rename accuracy AS "Accuracy (% Delta)" EventsPerSecond as "Events/Second (% Delta)" ScannedPerSecond as "Scanned/Second (% Delta)" searchspan_m as "Timespan (% Delta)" result_count as "# Results (% Delta)" | fields _time "*Second*" | timechart bins=50 avg(*) as *
